scrabble.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to try to find or do something very quickly, usually by moving your hands or feet in an uncontrolled way
scrabble.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He scrabbled for the light switch.
She was scrabbling around, searching for the door.
scrabble.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a game in which players try to make words from the separate letters they have
